title: Lovely Ladies Lyrics Naan Sigappu Manithan Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Lovely Ladies
Singers: DJ Gana Bala, Vijay Prakash, Megha, Aryan Dinesh
Movie: Naan Sigappu Manithan
Music: GV Prakash

Aahhaa Lovely ladies, Lovely ladies
Aahhaa .....
Aahhaa Lovely ladies, Lovely ladies
Aahhaa dancing to the move right now

Aadu machi aadu, podu machi podu
adhiradi kalandhida oru aattam
Aadu machi aadu, podu machi podu
adhiradi kalandhida oru aattam

Appan potta road-u, vandhu aadi paaru
danda nakkaa danda nakka tharai aattam

Sattam thittam madhikkada
satta kaalar edhukkadaa
chotta chotta oothikkada
pangaali vaa aadu.

Pattam pola maarikkada
etti thaandi aerikkadaa
ketta aattam pottukkada
santhosatha thaedu.

Veettathaan thaandi veliyila vaa
vazhakaya rasikka theruvukku vaa
mutta odanja kozhi porakkum
kattupaadu odanjaadhaan
inban porakkum.
Poottu pota manasukku enna kidaikkum

Whatsapp pengala paar
posabi pola kaaramathaar
machi thotuka lightaa
adikura elasukku idhuthaan rightaa

Goa vandha koottam
roomers couple aattam
ada kaigala thottukittu
mandangala aattikittu
attam onnu aadungalen tharai aattam.

Nettru enbadhu old aanadhu
naalai enbabhu waiting list aanadhu
indru mattrum gold aanadhu
kondaadalaam vaadaaa.

Velai velai endre dhinam
temple runnai pol odinom
santhosangal ennaavadhu
sarthaan poda vaada..

enakkula aasa romba irukku
adhaiyellaam sonnaa naan kirukku
emmanasu romba perusu
adhilulla aasaikku
alavu illa.
kanavukku thadai solla yaarumilla.

Aahhaa, Lovely ladies, Lovely ladies
Aahhaa, pari ok my boo right now
Aahhaa Lovely ladies, Lovely ladies
Aahhaa dancing to the move right now

Aadu machi aadu, podu machi podu
adhiradi kalandhida oru aattam

Appan potta road-u, vandhu aadi paaru
danda nakkaa danda nakka tharai aattam
